solution_line_template: Each portion of the distance they covered is {hallway_length}/({father_speed_ratio}+{son_speed_ratio}) = <<{hallway_length}/({father_speed_ratio}+{son_speed_ratio})={portion_length}>>{portion_length}m
The father covered three portions of the distance which is {father_speed_ratio}*{portion_length}m = <<{father_speed_ratio}*{portion_length}={father_distance}>>{father_distance}m from his end
